name: Finding Fifi
description:
'Finding Fifi' is a short point&click puzzle game with just a touch of Christmas.

In a house full of cats ...
Where could poor Fifi be hiding?

Observe. Listen. Pet the cats.
And find Fifi !

Features


  • A cosy game with puzzles and cats.
  • No time pressure.
  • The game automatically saves your progress.
